motivation.quote: Go for it now. The future is promised to no one.
motivation.author: Wayne Dyer

motivation.quote: Never tell a young person that anything cannot be done. God may have been waiting centuries for someone ignorant enough of the impossible to do that very thing.
motivation.author: John Holmes

motivation.quote: Bold is not the act of foolishness but the attribute and inner strength to act when others will not so as to move forward not backward.
motivation.author: Byron Pulsifer

motivation.quote: If we look at the world with a love of life, the world will reveal its beauty to us.
motivation.author: Daisaku Ikeda

motivation.quote: In skating over thin ice our safety is in our speed.
motivation.author: Ralph Emerson

motivation.quote: When you discover your mission, you will feel its demand. It will fill you with enthusiasm and a burning desire to get to work on it.
motivation.author: W. Clement Stone

motivation.quote: Never promise more than you can perform.
motivation.author: Publilius Syrus

motivation.quote: If you don't go after what you want, you'll never have it. If you don't ask, the answer is always no. If you don't step forward, you're always in the same place.
motivation.author: Nora Roberts

motivation.quote: I can't believe that God put us on this earth to be ordinary.
motivation.author: Lou Holtz

motivation.quote: There are no limitations to the mind except those we acknowledge.
motivation.author: Napoleon Hill

motivation.quote: It is through science that we prove, but through intuition that we discover.
motivation.author: Jules Poincare

motivation.quote: Don't be dismayed by good-byes. A farewell is necessary before you can meet again. And meeting again, after moments or lifetimes, is certain for those who are friends.
motivation.author: Richard Bach

motivation.quote: If someone in your life talked to you the way you talk to yourself, you would have left them long ago.
motivation.author: Carla Gordon

motivation.quote: The cosmos is neither moral or immoral; only people are. He who would move the world must first move himself.
motivation.author: Edward Ericson

motivation.quote: If you lose today, win tomorrow. In this never-ending spirit of challenge is the heart of a victor.
motivation.author: Daisaku Ikeda

motivation.quote: There is a way that nature speaks, that land speaks. Most of the time we are simply not patient enough, quiet enough, to pay attention to the story.
motivation.author: Linda Hogan

motivation.quote: Never tell me the sky is the limit when there are footprints on the moon.
motivation.author: Unknown

motivation.quote: I cannot say whether things will get better if we change; what I can say is they must change if they are to get better.
motivation.author: Georg Lichtenberg

motivation.quote: The greater part of human pain is unnecessary. It is self-created as long as the unobserved mind runs your life.
motivation.author: Eckhart Tolle

motivation.quote: Take it easy but take it.
motivation.author: Woody Guthrie

motivation.quote: Blessed is the man who expects nothing, for he shall never be disappointed.
motivation.author: Alexander Pope

motivation.quote: He who knows others is wise. He who knows himself is enlightened.
motivation.author: Lao Tzu

motivation.quote: The best way to predict your future is to create it.
motivation.author: Peter Drucker

motivation.quote: A garden is always a series of losses set against a few triumphs, like life itself.
motivation.author: May Sarton

motivation.quote: If facts are the seeds that later produce knowledge and wisdom, then the emotions and the impressions of the senses are the fertile soil in which the seeds must grow.
motivation.author: Rachel Carson

motivation.quote: Never mistake motion for action.
motivation.author: Ernest Hemingway

motivation.quote: One needs something to believe in, something for which one can have whole-hearted enthusiasm. One needs to feel that ones life has meaning, that one is needed in this world.
motivation.author: Hannah Senesh

motivation.quote: One who is too insistent on his own views, finds few to agree with him.
motivation.author: Lao Tzu

motivation.quote: Translation is the paradigm, the exemplar of all writing. It is translation that demonstrates most vividly the yearning for transformation that underlies every act involving speech, that supremely human gift.
motivation.author: Harry Burchell Mathews

motivation.quote: Meditation is the dissolution of thoughts in eternal awareness or Pure consciousness without objectification, knowing without thinking, merging finitude in infinity.
motivation.author: Voltaire

motivation.quote: The reasonable man adapts himself to the world; the unreasonable man persists in trying to adapt the world to himself. Therefore, all progress depends on the unreasonable man.
motivation.author: George Shaw

motivation.quote: Good instincts usually tell you what to do long before your head has figured it out.
motivation.author: Michael Burke

motivation.quote: It isn't what happens to us that causes us to suffer; it's what we say to ourselves about what happens.
motivation.author: Pema Chodron

motivation.quote: Those who dream by day are cognizant of many things which escape those who dream only by night.
motivation.author: Edgar Allan Poe

motivation.quote: We cannot hold a torch to light another's path without brightening our own.
motivation.author: Ben Sweetland

motivation.quote: You are never given a wish without also being given the power to make it come true. You may have to work for it, however.
motivation.author: Richard Bach

motivation.quote: Kind words can be short and easy to speak, but their echoes are truly endless.
motivation.author: Mother Teresa

motivation.quote: Count your joys instead of your woes. Count your friends instead of your foes.
motivation.author: Unknown

motivation.quote: Dreams come true. Without that possibility, nature would not incite us to have them.
motivation.author: John Updike

motivation.quote: Staying in one place is the best path to be taken over and surpassed by many.
motivation.author: Byron Pulsifer

motivation.quote: Imagination will often carry us to worlds that never were. But without it we go nowhere.
motivation.author: Carl Sagan

motivation.quote: When one door of happiness closes, another opens; but often we look so long at the closed door that we do not see the one which has been opened for us.
motivation.author: Helen Keller

motivation.quote: A leader or a man of action in a crisis almost always acts subconsciously and then thinks of the reasons for his action.
motivation.author: Jawaharlal Nehru

motivation.quote: I have no special talent. I am only passionately curious.
motivation.author: Albert Einstein

motivation.quote: I endeavour to be wise when I cannot be merry, easy when I cannot be glad, content with what cannot be mended and patient when there is no redress.
motivation.author: Elizabeth Montagu

motivation.quote: The height of your accomplishments will equal the depth of your convictions.
motivation.author: William Scolavino

motivation.quote: If I am not for myself, who will be for me? If I am not for others, what am I? And if not now, when?
motivation.author: Rabbi Hillel

motivation.quote: When I dare to be powerful, to use my strength in the service of my vision, then it becomes less and less important whether I am afraid.
motivation.author: Audre Lorde

motivation.quote: All great men are gifted with intuition. They know without reasoning or analysis, what they need to know.
motivation.author: Alexis Carrel

motivation.quote: To get the full value of joy you must have someone to divide it with.
motivation.author: Mark Twain

motivation.quote: Sometimes our fate resembles a fruit tree in winter. Who would think that those branches would turn green again and blossom, but we hope it, we know it.
motivation.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

motivation.quote: We lost because we told ourselves we lost.
motivation.author: Leo Tolstoy

motivation.quote: Success is determined by those whom prove the impossible, possible.
motivation.author: James Pence

motivation.quote: Good advice is always certain to be ignored, but that's no reason not to give it.
motivation.author: Agatha Christie

motivation.quote: The winner ain't the one with the fastest car it's the one who refuses to lose.
motivation.author: Dale Earnhardt

motivation.quote: Spirituality can be severed from both vicious sectarianism and thoughtless banalities. Spirituality, I have come to see, is nothing less than the thoughtful love of life.
motivation.author: Robert C. Solomon

motivation.quote: No one has a finer command of language than the person who keeps his mouth shut.
motivation.author: Sam Rayburn

motivation.quote: The only person who never makes mistakes is the person who never does anything.
motivation.author: Denis Waitley

motivation.quote: Life is what happens to you while you're busy making other plans.
motivation.author: John Lennon

motivation.quote: Discovery consists of seeing what everybody has seen and thinking what nobody else has thought.
motivation.author: Jonathan Swift

motivation.quote: If you have knowledge, let others light their candles in it.
motivation.author: Margaret Fuller

motivation.quote: It is impossible for a man to learn what he thinks he already knows.
motivation.author: Epictetus

motivation.quote: If you find yourself in a hole, the first thing to do is stop digging.
motivation.author: Will Rogers

motivation.quote: To make no mistakes is not in the power of man; but from their errors and mistakes the wise and good learn wisdom for the future.
motivation.author: Plutarch

motivation.quote: I think you can have moderate success by copying something else, but if you really want to knock it out of the park, you have to do something different and take chances.
motivation.author: Lee Womack

motivation.quote: Everything we hear is an opinion, not a fact. Everything we see is a perspective, not the truth.
motivation.author: Marcus Aurelius

motivation.quote: Six essential qualities that are the key to success: Sincerity, personal integrity, humility, courtesy, wisdom, charity.
motivation.author: William Menninger

motivation.quote: I have an everyday religion that works for me. Love yourself first, and everything else falls into line.
motivation.author: Lucille Ball

motivation.quote: Flow with whatever is happening and let your mind be free. Stay centred by accepting whatever you are doing. This is the ultimate.
motivation.author: Chuang Tzu

motivation.quote: Nothing could be worse than the fear that one had given up too soon, and left one unexpended effort that might have saved the world.
motivation.author: Jane Addams

motivation.quote: The energy of the mind is the essence of life.
motivation.author: Aristotle

motivation.quote: Begin, be bold, and venture to be wise.
motivation.author: Horace

motivation.quote: Give a man a fish and you feed him for a day. Teach him how to fish and you feed him for a lifetime.
motivation.author: Lao Tzu

motivation.quote: A wise man will make more opportunities than he finds.
motivation.author: Francis Bacon

motivation.quote: Slow down and enjoy life. It's not only the scenery you miss by going too fast you also miss the sense of where you are going and why.
motivation.author: Eddie Cantor

motivation.quote: Miracles come in moments. Be ready and willing.
motivation.author: Wayne Dyer

motivation.quote: Numberless are the worlds wonders, but none more wonderful than man.
motivation.author: Sophocles

motivation.quote: So is cheerfulness, or a good temper, the more it is spent, the more remains.
motivation.author: Ralph Emerson

motivation.quote: The true way to render ourselves happy is to love our work and find in it our pleasure.
motivation.author: Francoise de Motteville

motivation.quote: When you judge another, you do not define them, you define yourself.
motivation.author: Wayne Dyer

motivation.quote: Argue for your limitations, and sure enough they're yours.
motivation.author: Richard Bach

motivation.quote: He who wishes to secure the good of others, has already secured his own.
motivation.author: Confucius

motivation.quote: Wise men talk because they have something to say; fools, because they have to say something.
motivation.author: Plato

motivation.quote: Life is really simple, but we insist on making it complicated.
motivation.author: Confucius

motivation.quote: The future is an opaque mirror. Anyone who tries to look into it sees nothing but the dim outlines of an old and worried face.
motivation.author: Jim Bishop

motivation.quote: Everything that irritates us about others can lead us to a better understanding of ourselves.
motivation.author: Carl Jung

motivation.quote: Beware of the half truth. You may have gotten hold of the wrong half.
motivation.author: Unknown

motivation.quote: The greatest mistake you can make in life is to be continually fearing you will make one.
motivation.author: Elbert Hubbard

motivation.quote: I have never been hurt by anything I didn't say.
motivation.author: Calvin Coolidge

motivation.quote: Be not angry that you cannot make others as you wish them to be, since you cannot make yourself as you wish to be.
motivation.author: Thomas Kempis

motivation.quote: Adversity causes some men to break, others to break records.
motivation.author: William Ward

motivation.quote: An invincible determination can accomplish almost anything and in this lies the great distinction between great men and little men.
motivation.author: Thomas Fuller

motivation.quote: The industrial landscape is already littered with remains of once successful companies that could not adapt their strategic vision to altered conditions of competition.
motivation.author: Abernathy

motivation.quote: Example has more followers than reason.
motivation.author: Christian Bovee

motivation.quote: One that desires to excel should endeavour in those things that are in themselves most excellent.
motivation.author: Epictetus

motivation.quote: If you have made mistakes, there is always another chance for you. You may have a fresh start any moment you choose.
motivation.author: Mary Pickford

motivation.quote: The only Zen you find on the tops of mountains is the Zen you bring up there.
motivation.author: Robert Pirsig

motivation.quote: Gratitude is riches. Complaint is poverty.
motivation.author: Doris Day

motivation.quote: Strong people make as many mistakes as weak people. Difference is that strong people admit their mistakes, laugh at them, learn from them. That is how they become strong.
motivation.author: Richard Needham

motivation.quote: To know your purpose is to live a life of direction, and in that direction is found peace and tranquillity.
motivation.author: Byron Pulsifer

motivation.quote: You can stand tall without standing on someone. You can be a victor without having victims.
motivation.author: Harriet Woods

motivation.quote: Bad times have a scientific value. These are occasions a good learner would not miss.
motivation.author: Ralph Emerson

motivation.quote: It's not who you are that holds you back, it's who you think you're not.
motivation.author: Unknown

motivation.quote: All children are artists. The problem is how to remain an artist once he grows up.
motivation.author: Pablo Picasso

motivation.quote: Either I will find a way, or I will make one.
motivation.author: Philip Sidney

motivation.quote: He who knows that enough is enough will always have enough.
motivation.author: Lao Tzu

motivation.quote: The only way to have a friend is to be one.
motivation.author: Ralph Emerson

motivation.quote: If we had no winter, the spring would not be so pleasant; if we did not sometimes taste of adversity, prosperity would not be so welcome.
motivation.author: Anne Bradstreet

motivation.quote: Joy is what happens to us when we allow ourselves to recognize how good things really are.
motivation.author: Marianne Williamson

motivation.quote: Your vision will become clear only when you can look into your own heart. Who looks outside, dreams; who looks inside, awakes.
motivation.author: Carl Jung

motivation.quote: There is never enough time to do everything, but there is always enough time to do the most important thing.
motivation.author: Brian Tracy

motivation.quote: You really can change the world if you care enough.
motivation.author: Marian Edelman

motivation.quote: What you are is what you have been. What you will be is what you do now.
motivation.author: Buddha

motivation.quote: Our lives are the only meaningful expression of what we believe and in Whom we believe. And the only real wealth, for any of us, lies in our faith.
motivation.author: Gordon Hinckley

motivation.quote: There surely is in human nature an inherent propensity to extract all the good out of all the evil.
motivation.author: Benjamin Haydon

motivation.quote: Music in the soul can be heard by the universe.
motivation.author: Lao Tzu

motivation.quote: What we see depends mainly on what we look for.
motivation.author: John Lubbock

motivation.quote: To hell with circumstances; I create opportunities.
motivation.author: Bruce Lee

motivation.quote: The truest greatness lies in being kind, the truest wisdom in a happy mind.
motivation.author: Ella Wilcox

motivation.quote: An ounce of emotion is equal to a ton of facts.
motivation.author: John Junor

motivation.quote: We need to find the courage to say NO to the things and people that are not serving us if we want to rediscover ourselves and live our lives with authenticity.
motivation.author: Barbara De Angelis

motivation.quote: Great is the art of beginning, but greater is the art of ending.
motivation.author: Lazurus Long

motivation.quote: Simply put, you believer that things or people make you unhappy, but this is not accurate. You make yourself unhappy.
motivation.author: Wayne Dyer

motivation.quote: Nothing will work unless you do.
motivation.author: Maya Angelou

motivation.quote: Our ability to achieve happiness and success depends on the strength of our wings.
motivation.author: Catherine Pulsifer

motivation.quote: To go against the dominant thinking of your friends, of most of the people you see every day, is perhaps the most difficult act of heroism you can perform.
motivation.author: Theodore H. White

motivation.quote: Gratitude makes sense of our past, brings peace for today, and creates a vision for tomorrow.
motivation.author: Melody Beattie

motivation.quote: Into each life rain must fall but rain can be the giver of life and it is all in your attitude that makes rain produce sunshine.
motivation.author: Byron Pulsifer

motivation.quote: We are all inclined to judge ourselves by our ideals; others, by their acts.
motivation.author: Harold Nicolson

motivation.quote: Nothing is a waste of time if you use the experience wisely.
motivation.author: Rodin

motivation.quote: If one way be better than another, that you may be sure is natures way.
motivation.author: Aristotle

motivation.quote: Here is one quality that one must possess to win, and that is definiteness of purpose, the knowledge of what one wants, and a burning desire to possess it.
motivation.author: Napoleon Hill

motivation.quote: It is not in the stars to hold our destiny but in ourselves.
motivation.author: William Shakespeare

motivation.quote: Using the power of decision gives you the capacity to get past any excuse to change any and every part of your life in an instant.
motivation.author: Tony Robbins

motivation.quote: I will prepare and some day my chance will come.
motivation.author: Abraham Lincoln

motivation.quote: Sometimes the cards we are dealt are not always fair. However you must keep smiling and moving on.
motivation.author: Tom Jackson

motivation.quote: The Best Way To Get Started Is To Quit Talking And Begin Doing.
motivation.author: Walt Disney

motivation.quote: The Pessimist Sees Difficulty In Every Opportunity. The Optimist Sees Opportunity In Every Difficulty.
motivation.author: Winston Churchill

motivation.quote: Don't Let Yesterday Take Up Too Much Of Today.
motivation.author: Will Rogers

motivation.quote: You Learn More From Failure Than From Success. Don't Let It Stop You. Failure Builds Character.
motivation.author: Unknown

motivation.quote: It's Not Whether You Get Knocked Down, It's Whether You Get Up.
motivation.author: Vince Lombardi

motivation.quote: If You Are Working On Something That You Really Care About, You Don't Have To Be Pushed. The Vision Pulls You.
motivation.author: Steve Jobs

motivation.quote: People Who Are Crazy Enough To Think They Can Change The World, Are The Ones Who Do.
motivation.author: Rob Siltanen

motivation.quote: Failure Will Never Overtake Me If My Determination To Succeed Is Strong Enough.
motivation.author: Og Mandino

motivation.quote: Entrepreneurs Are Great At Dealing With Uncertainty And Also Very Good At Minimizing Risk. That's The Classic Entrepreneur.
motivation.author: Mohnish Pabrai

motivation.quote: We May Encounter Many Defeats But We Must Not Be Defeated.
motivation.author: Maya Angelou

motivation.quote: Knowing Is Not Enough; We Must Apply. Wishing Is Not Enough; We Must Do.
motivation.author: Johann Wolfgang Von Goethe

motivation.quote: Imagine Your Life Is Perfect In Every Respect; What Would It Look Like?
motivation.author: Brian Tracy

motivation.quote: Whether You Think You Can Or Think You Can't, You're Right.
motivation.author: Henry Ford

motivation.quote: Security Is Mostly A Superstition. Life Is Either A Daring Adventure Or Nothing.
motivation.author: Helen Keller

motivation.quote: The Man Who Has Confidence In Himself Gains The Confidence Of Others.
motivation.author: Hasidic Proverb

motivation.quote: The Only Limit To Our Realization Of Tomorrow Will Be Our Doubts Of Today.
motivation.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

motivation.quote: Creativity Is Intelligence Having Fun.
motivation.author: Albert Einstein

motivation.quote: What You Lack In Talent Can Be Made Up With Desire, Hustle And Giving 110% All The Time.
motivation.author: Don Zimmer

motivation.quote: Do What You Can With All You Have, Wherever You Are.
motivation.author: Theodore Roosevelt

motivation.quote: Develop An ‘Attitude Of Gratitude'. Say Thank You To Everyone You Meet For Everything They Do For You.
motivation.author: Brian Tracy

motivation.quote: You Are Never Too Old To Set Another Goal Or To Dream A New Dream.
motivation.author: C.S. Lewis

motivation.quote: To See What Is Right And Not Do It Is A Lack Of Courage.
motivation.author: Confucius

motivation.quote: Reading Is To The Mind, As Exercise Is To The Body.
motivation.author: Brian Tracy

motivation.quote: For Every Reason It's Not Possible, There Are Hundreds Of People Who Have Faced The Same Circumstances And Succeeded.
motivation.author: Jack Canfield

motivation.quote: Things Work Out Best For Those Who Make The Best Of How Things Work Out.
motivation.author: John Wooden

motivation.quote: A Room Without Books Is Like A Body Without A Soul.
motivation.author: Marcus Tullius Cicero

fun.quote: You were my brother, Anakin. I loved you.
fun.author: Obi-Wan Kenobi

fun.quote: Just for once, let me look on you with my own eyes.
fun.author: Anakin Skywalker

fun.quote: I am no Jedi.
fun.author: Ahsoka Tano

fun.quote: I’ll never turn to the dark side. You’ve failed, your highness. I am a Jedi, like my father before me.
fun.author: Luke Skywalker

fun.quote: The Sith killed each other, victims of their own greed. But from the ashes of their destruction, I was the last survivor. I chose to pass my knowledge on to only one. I created a legacy so resilient that now you come before me.
fun.author: Darth Bane

fun.quote: Remember, my dear Obi-Wan. I’ve loved you always. I always will.
fun.author: Duchess Satine Kryze

fun.quote: Life does not treat you fairly or unfairly, it merely is. It is up to each of us to be fair, or unfair.
fun.author: Qui-Gon Jinn

fun.quote: It’s the ship that made the Kessel run in less than twelve parsecs. I’ve outrun Imperial starships. Not the local bulk cruisers, mind you. I’m talking about the big Corellian ships, now. She’s fast enough for you, old man.
fun.author: Han Solo

fun.quote: The garbage’ll do!
fun.author: Rey

fun.quote: The Sith took everything from me. Ripped me from my mother’s arms, murdered my brother, used me as a weapon, and then cast me aside. Abandoned me. Once, I had power — now I have nothing.
fun.author: Maul

fun.quote: What if I told you that the Republic was now under the control of a Dark Lord of the Sith?
fun.author: Count Dooku

fun.quote: Power! Unlimited power!
fun.author: Darth Sidious

fun.quote: When gone am I, the last of the Jedi will you be. The Force runs strong in your family. Pass on what you have learned.
fun.author: Yoda

fun.quote: If you define yourself by your power to take life, your desire to dominate, to possess, then you have nothing.
fun.author: Obi-Wan Kenobi

fun.quote: You have failed me for the last time.
fun.author: Darth Vader

fun.quote: I’m one with the Force. The Force is with me.
fun.author: Chirrut Îmwe

fun.quote: In time, the suffering of your people will persuade you to see our point of view.
fun.author: Nute Gunray

fun.quote: Yes, a Jedi’s strength flows from the Force. But beware of the dark side. Anger, fear, aggression; the dark side of the Force are they. Easily they flow, quick to join you in a fight. If once you start down the dark path, forever will it dominate your destiny, consume you it will, as it did Obi-Wan’s apprentice.
fun.author: Yoda

fun.quote: Fear is the path to the dark side. Fear leads to anger; anger leads to hate; hate leads to suffering. I sense much fear in you.
fun.author: Yoda

fun.quote: So this is how liberty dies. With thunderous applause.
fun.author: Padmé Amidala

fun.quote: I’ll never turn to the dark side. You’ve failed, your highness. I am a Jedi, like my father before me.
fun.author: Luke Skywalker

fun.quote: Secrets must be exposed when found. Detours must be taken when encountered. And if you are the one who stands at the crossroads or the place of concealment, you must never leave it to another to act in your place.
fun.author: Qui-Gon Jinn

fun.quote: Power! Unlimited power!
fun.author: Darth Sidious

fun.quote: When gone am I, the last of the Jedi will you be. The Force runs strong in your family. Pass on what you have learned.
fun.author: Yoda

fun.quote: Every time I walked away from something I wanted to forget, I told myself it was for a cause that I believed in. A cause that was worth it. Without that, we’re lost.
fun.author: Cassian Andor

fun.quote: This technological terror is nothing compared to the power of the force
fun.author: Darth Vader

fun.quote: Help me, Obi-Wan Kenobi. You’re my only hope.
fun.author: Leia Organa

fun.quote: No. I am your father.
fun.author: Darth Vader

fun.quote: Death is a natural part of life. Rejoice for those around you who transform into the Force. Mourn them do not. Miss them do not. Attachment leads to jealously. The shadow of greed, that is.
fun.author: Yoda

fun.quote: Do. Or do not. There is no try.
fun.author: Yoda

fun.quote: You've been a good apprentice, Obi-Wan, and you're a much wiser man than I am. I foresee you will become a great Jedi Knight.
fun.author: Qui-Gon Jinn

fun.quote: Jyn, I’ll be there for you. Cassian said I had to.
fun.author: K-2SO

fun.quote: I’m just a simple man trying to make my way in the universe.
fun.author: Jango Fett

fun.quote: You know, no matter how much we fought, I’ve always hated watching you leave.
fun.author: Leia Organa

fun.quote: Train yourself to let go of everything you fear to lose.
fun.author: Yoda

fun.quote: The Force will be with you. Always.
fun.author: Obi-Wan Kenobi

fun.quote: I am no Jedi.
fun.author: Ahsoka Tano

fun.quote: I’ll never turn to the dark side. You’ve failed, your highness. I am a Jedi, like my father before me.
fun.author: Luke Skywalker

fun.quote: Death is a natural part of life. Rejoice for those around you who transform into the Force. Mourn them do not. Miss them do not. Attachment leads to jealously. The shadow of greed, that is.
fun.author: Yoda

fun.quote: When gone am I, the last of the Jedi will you be. The Force runs strong in your family. Pass on what you have learned.
fun.author: Yoda

fun.quote: [Luke:] I can’t believe it. [Yoda:] That is why you fail. -
fun.author: Yoda / Luke

fun.quote: If you define yourself by your power to take life, your desire to dominate, to possess, then you have nothing.
fun.author: Obi-Wan Kenobi

fun.quote: You've been a good apprentice, Obi-Wan, and you're a much wiser man than I am. I foresee you will become a great Jedi Knight.
fun.author: Qui-Gon Jinn

fun.quote: I’ll never turn to the dark side. You’ve failed, your highness. I am a Jedi, like my father before me.
fun.author: Luke Skywalker

fun.quote: Now, young Skywalker, you will die.
fun.author: Emperor Palpatine

fun.quote: We must keep our faith in the Republic. The day we stop believing democracy can work is the day we lose it.
fun.author: Queen Jamillia

fun.quote: Fear is the path to the dark side. Fear leads to anger; anger leads to hate; hate leads to suffering. I sense much fear in you.
fun.author: Yoda

fun.quote: Life does not treat you fairly or unfairly, it merely is. It is up to each of us to be fair, or unfair.
fun.author: Qui-Gon Jinn

fun.quote: Every time I walked away from something I wanted to forget, I told myself it was for a cause that I believed in. A cause that was worth it. Without that, we’re lost.
fun.author: Cassian Andor

fun.quote: Remember, my dear Obi-Wan. I’ve loved you always. I always will.
fun.author: Duchess Satine Kryze

fun.quote: What if I told you that the Republic was now under the control of a Dark Lord of the Sith?
fun.author: Count Dooku

entrepreneurship.quote: I am more afraid of an army of one hundred sheep led by a lion than an army of one hundred lions led by a sheep.
entrepreneurship.author: Charles Maurice

entrepreneurship.quote: The whole problem with the world is that fools and fanatics are always so certain of themselves, but wiser people so full of doubts.
entrepreneurship.author: Bertrand Russell

entrepreneurship.quote: We are what we repeatedly do. Excellence, then, is not an act, but a habit.
entrepreneurship.author: Aristotle

entrepreneurship.quote: Cannibals prefer those who have no spines.
entrepreneurship.author: Stanislaw Lem

entrepreneurship.quote: A ship in harbor is safe. But that's now what ships are built for.
entrepreneurship.author: William Shedd

entrepreneurship.quote: If one does not know to which port one is sailing, no wind is favorable.
entrepreneurship.author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

entrepreneurship.quote: You miss 100% of the shots you don't take.
entrepreneurship.author: Wayne Gretzky

entrepreneurship.quote: I'm not a businessman. I'm a business, man.
entrepreneurship.author: Jay-Z

entrepreneurship.quote: The vision must be followed by the venture. It is not enough to stare up the steps – we must step up the stairs.
entrepreneurship.author: Vance Hayner

entrepreneurship.quote: Do not wait to strike until the iron is hot; but make it hot by striking.
entrepreneurship.author: William B. Sprague

entrepreneurship.quote: It's easier to ask forgiveness than it is to get permission.
entrepreneurship.author: Grace Hopper

entrepreneurship.quote: Twenty years from now you will be more disappointed by the things that you didn't do than by the ones you did do.
entrepreneurship.author: Mark Twain

entrepreneurship.quote: One day your life will flash before your eyes. Make sure it is worth watching.
entrepreneurship.author: Mooie

entrepreneurship.quote: I think it's wrong that only one company makes the game Monopoly.
entrepreneurship.author: Steven Wright

entrepreneurship.quote: Ever notice how it's a penny for your thoughts, yet you put in your two-cents? Someone is making a penny on the deal.
entrepreneurship.author: Steven Wright

entrepreneurship.quote: Catch a man a fish, and you can sell it to him. Teach a man to fish, and you ruin a wonderful business opportunity.
entrepreneurship.author: Karl (maybe Groucho) Marx

entrepreneurship.quote: I used to sell furniture for a living. The trouble was, it was my own.
entrepreneurship.author: Les Dawson

entrepreneurship.quote: Marking dynamos for repair $10,000.00—2 hours labor $10.00; knowing where to mark $9,990.00.
entrepreneurship.author: Invoice from Charles Steinmetz

entrepreneurship.quote: By working faithfully eight hours a day you may eventually get to be boss and work twelve hours a day.
entrepreneurship.author: Robert Frost

entrepreneurship.quote: My son is now an ‘entrepreneur'. That's what you're called when you don't have a job.
entrepreneurship.author: Ted Turner

entrepreneurship.quote: I didn't go to college, but if I did, I would've taken all my tests at a restaurant, 'cause ‘The customer is always right.'
entrepreneurship.author: Mitch Hedberg

entrepreneurship.quote: Formal education will make you a living. Self education will make you a fortune.
entrepreneurship.author: Jim Rohn

entrepreneurship.quote: The greatest reward in becoming a millionaire is not the amount of money that you earn. It is the kind of person that you have to become to become a millionaire in the first place.
entrepreneurship.author: Jim Rohn

entrepreneurship.quote: If you're not learning while you're earning, you're cheating yourself out of the better portion of your compensation.
entrepreneurship.author: Napoleon Hill

entrepreneurship.quote: A business that makes nothing but money is a poor business.
entrepreneurship.author: Henry Ford

entrepreneurship.quote: After a certain point, money is meaningless. It ceases to be the goal. The game is what counts.
entrepreneurship.author: Aristotle

entrepreneurship.quote: I treat business a bit like a computer game. I count money as points. I'm doing really well: making lots of money and lots of points.
entrepreneurship.author: Michael Dunlop

entrepreneurship.quote: All of my friends were doing babysitting jobs. I wanted money without the job.
entrepreneurship.author: Adam Horwitz

entrepreneurship.quote: I don't pay good wages because I have a lot of money; I have a lot of money because I pay good wages.
entrepreneurship.author: Robert Bosch

entrepreneurship.quote: Lend your friend $20. If he doesn't pay you back then he's not your friend. Money well spent.
entrepreneurship.author: Ted Nicolas

entrepreneurship.quote: Money and success don't change people; they merely amplify what is already there.
entrepreneurship.author: Will Smith

entrepreneurship.quote: The secret of getting ahead is getting started.
entrepreneurship.author: Agatha Christie

entrepreneurship.quote: Hire character. Train skill.
entrepreneurship.author: Peter Schultz

entrepreneurship.quote: In preparing for battle I have always found that plans are useless, but planning is indispensable.
entrepreneurship.author: Dwight D. Eisenhower

entrepreneurship.quote: You've got to stop doing all the things that people have tried, tested, and found out don't work.
entrepreneurship.author: Michael Dunlop

entrepreneurship.quote: I never perfected an invention that I did not think about in terms of the service it might give others… I find out what the world needs, then I proceed to invent.
entrepreneurship.author: Thomas Edison

entrepreneurship.quote: If you're not making mistakes, then you're not making decisions.
entrepreneurship.author: Catherine Cook

entrepreneurship.quote: Your most unhappy customers are your greatest source of learning.
entrepreneurship.author: Bill Gates

entrepreneurship.quote: One can get anything if he is willing to help enough others get what they want.
entrepreneurship.author: Zig Ziglar

entrepreneurship.quote: An entrepreneur tends to bite off a little more than he can chew hoping he'll quickly learn how to chew it.
entrepreneurship.author: Roy Ash

entrepreneurship.quote: The true entrepreneur is a doer, not a dreamer.
entrepreneurship.author: Nolan Bushnell

entrepreneurship.quote: Whenever you are asked if you can do a job, tell 'em, ‘Certainly, I can!' Then get busy and find out how to do it.
entrepreneurship.author: Theodore Roosevelt

entrepreneurship.quote: Everything started as nothing.
entrepreneurship.author: Ben Weissenstein

entrepreneurship.quote: If you start with nothing and end up with nothing, there's nothing lost.
entrepreneurship.author: Michael Dunlop

entrepreneurship.quote: Start today, not tomorrow. If anything, you should have started yesterday.
entrepreneurship.author: Emil Motycka

entrepreneurship.quote: Make it happen now, not tomorrow. Tomorrow is a loser's excuse.
entrepreneurship.author: Andrew Fashion

entrepreneurship.quote: Every day I get up and look through the Forbes list of the richest people in America. If I'm not there, I go to work.
entrepreneurship.author: Robert Orben

entrepreneurship.quote: Entrepreneurship is living a few years of your life like most people won't, so that you can spend the rest of your life like most people can't.
entrepreneurship.author: Anonymous

entrepreneurship.quote: Yesterday's home runs don't win today's games.
entrepreneurship.author: Babe Ruth

entrepreneurship.quote: You should always stay hungry. Stay hungry, so you can eat.
entrepreneurship.author: Syed Balkhi

entrepreneurship.quote: If you're not living life on the edge, you're taking up too much space.
entrepreneurship.author: Anonymous

entrepreneurship.quote: I wasn't satisfied just to earn a good living. I was looking to make a statement.
entrepreneurship.author: Donald Trump

entrepreneurship.quote: Opportunity is missed by most people because it is dressed in overalls and looks like work.
entrepreneurship.author: Thomas Edison

entrepreneurship.quote: You must either modify your dreams or magnify your skills.
entrepreneurship.author: Jim Rohn

entrepreneurship.quote: Keep away from people who try to belittle your ambitions. Small people always do that, but the really great make you feel that you, too, can become great.
entrepreneurship.author: Mark Twain

entrepreneurship.quote: Not a single person whose name is worth remembering lived a life of ease.
entrepreneurship.author: Ryan P. Allis

entrepreneurship.quote: If you think that you are going to love something, give it a try. You're going to kick yourself in the butt for the rest of your life if you don't.
entrepreneurship.author: Joe Penna

entrepreneurship.quote: The best time to plant a tree is twenty years ago. The second best time is now.
entrepreneurship.author: Chinese Proverb

entrepreneurship.quote: If you want one year of prosperity, grow grain. If you want ten years of prosperity, grow trees. If you want one hundred years of prosperity, grow people.
entrepreneurship.author: Chinese Proverb

entrepreneurship.quote: Vision without action is a daydream. Action without vision is a nightmare.
entrepreneurship.author: Japanese Proverb

entrepreneurship.quote: Sow a thought, reap an action; sow an action, reap a habit; sow a habit, reap a character; sow a character, reap a destiny.
entrepreneurship.author: Chinese Proverb

entrepreneurship.quote: A bad workman blames his tools.
entrepreneurship.author: Chinese Proverb

entrepreneurship.quote: A fall into a ditch makes you wiser.
entrepreneurship.author: Chinese Proverb

entrepreneurship.quote: Defeat isn't bitter if you don't swallow it.
entrepreneurship.author: Chinese Proverb

entrepreneurship.quote: The diamond cannot be polished without friction, nor the man perfected without trials.
entrepreneurship.author: Chinese Proverb

entrepreneurship.quote: A jade stone is useless before it is processed; a man is good-for-nothing until he is educated.
entrepreneurship.author: Chinese Proverb

entrepreneurship.quote: A journey of a thousand miles begins with a single step.
entrepreneurship.author: Chinese Proverb

entrepreneurship.quote: The loftiest towers rise from the ground.
entrepreneurship.author: Chinese Proverb

entrepreneurship.quote: Building a castle is difficult. Defending and maintaining it is harder still.
entrepreneurship.author: Asian Proverb

entrepreneurship.quote: A person who says it cannot be done should not interrupt the man doing it.
entrepreneurship.author: Chinese Proverb

entrepreneurship.quote: All cats love fish but fear to wet their paws.
entrepreneurship.author: Chinese Proverb

entrepreneurship.quote: Don't stand by the water and long for fish; go home and weave a net.
entrepreneurship.author: Chinese Proverb

entrepreneurship.quote: Everyone should carefully observe which way his heart draws him, and then choose that way with all his strength.
entrepreneurship.author: Hasidic Proverb

entrepreneurship.quote: Failing to plan is planning to fail.
entrepreneurship.author: Chinese Proverb

entrepreneurship.quote: If you pay peanuts, you get monkeys.
entrepreneurship.author: Chinese Proverb

entrepreneurship.quote: Make happy those who are near, and those who are far will come.
entrepreneurship.author: Chinese Proverb

entrepreneurship.quote: Teachers open the door. You enter by yourself.
entrepreneurship.author: Chinese Proverb

entrepreneurship.quote: Find a job you love and you'll never work a day in your life.
entrepreneurship.author: Confucius

entrepreneurship.quote: The entrepreneur builds an enterprise; the technician builds a job.
entrepreneurship.author: Michael Gerber

entrepreneurship.quote: If you want to be inventive, you have to be willing to fail.
entrepreneurship.author: Jeff Bezos

entrepreneurship.quote: The challenge is not just to build a company that can endure; but to build one that is worthy of enduring.
entrepreneurship.author: Jim Collins

entrepreneurship.quote: Success is a lousy teacher. It seduces smart people into thinking they can't lose.
entrepreneurship.author: Bill Gates

entrepreneurship.quote: Don't treat your customers like a bunch of purses and wallets.
entrepreneurship.author: Chris Brogan

entrepreneurship.quote: Nine out of ten businesses fail; so I came up with a foolproof plan
entrepreneurship.author: create ten businesses.

entrepreneurship.quote: I'm not a businessman
entrepreneurship.author: I'm a business, man.

entrepreneurship.quote: If plan 'A' fails, remember you have 25 letters left.
entrepreneurship.author: Chris Guillebeau

entrepreneurship.quote: We make a living by what we get. But we make a life by what we give.
entrepreneurship.author: Winston Churchhill

entrepreneurship.quote: Believe that you will succeed and you will.
entrepreneurship.author: Dale Carnegie

entrepreneurship.quote: Victory comes only after many struggles and countless defeats.
entrepreneurship.author: Og Mandino

entrepreneurship.quote: As long as you're going to be thinking anyway, think big.
entrepreneurship.author: Donald Trump

entrepreneurship.quote: Success is how high you bounce after you hit bottom
entrepreneurship.author: General George Patton

entrepreneurship.quote: Remembering you are going to die is the best way I know to avoid the trap of thinking you have something to lose.
entrepreneurship.author: Steve Jobs

entrepreneurship.quote: It's not about how to get started; its about how to get noticed.
entrepreneurship.author: Steve Case

entrepreneurship.quote: A ship in harbor is safe, but that's not what ships are for.
entrepreneurship.author: John Shedd

entrepreneurship.quote: If I find 10,000 ways something won't work, I haven't failed. I am not discouraged, because every wrong attempt discarded is often a step forward.
entrepreneurship.author: Thomas Edison

entrepreneurship.quote: Business opportunities are like buses, there's always another one coming.
entrepreneurship.author: Richard Branson

entrepreneurship.quote: If we don't allow ourselves to make mistakes, we will never invest in things that are radical.
entrepreneurship.author: Jeff Clavier

entrepreneurship.quote: The critical ingredient is getting off your butt and doing something.
entrepreneurship.author: Nolan Bushnell

entrepreneurship.quote: Nothing will work unless you do.
entrepreneurship.author: Maya Angelou

entrepreneurship.quote: Try not to be a man of success, but rather try to become a man of value.
entrepreneurship.author: Albert Einstein

entrepreneurship.quote: You won't get anything unless you have the vision to imagine it.
entrepreneurship.author: John Lennon

entrepreneurship.quote: A man must be big enough to admit his mistakes, smart enough to profit from them, and strong enough to correct them.
entrepreneurship.author: John C. Maxwell

entrepreneurship.quote: In the modern world of business, it is useless to be a creative, original thinker unless you can also sell what you create.
entrepreneurship.author: David Ogilvy

entrepreneurship.quote: Success is doing what you want, where you want, when you want, with whom you want as much as you want.
entrepreneurship.author: Tony Robbins

entrepreneurship.quote: If you don't have a competitive advantage don't compete.
entrepreneurship.author: Jack Welsh

entrepreneurship.quote: You were born to win, but to be a winner, you must plan to win, prepare to win, and expect to win.
entrepreneurship.author: Zig Ziglar

entrepreneurship.quote: If everything seems under control, you're just not going fast enough.
entrepreneurship.author: Mario Andretti

entrepreneurship.quote: Don't be trapped by dogma which is living with the results of other people's thinking.
entrepreneurship.author: Steve Jobs

entrepreneurship.quote: Do or do not. There is no try.
entrepreneurship.author: Yoda

entrepreneurship.quote: Show me a person who never made a mistake, and I will show you a person who never did anything.
entrepreneurship.author: William Rosenberg, founder of Dunkin' Donuts

entrepreneurship.quote: Ideas are commodity. Execution of them is not.
entrepreneurship.author: Michael Dell, CEO of Dell

entrepreneurship.quote: User experience is everything. It always has been, but it's undervalued and underinvested in. If you don't know user-centered design, study it. Hire people who know it. Obsess over it. Live and breathe it. Get your whole company on board.
entrepreneurship.author: Evan Williams, co-founder of Twitter

entrepreneurship.quote: A pessimist sees the difficulty in every opportunity; an optimist sees the opportunity in every difficulty.
entrepreneurship.author: Winston Churchill, British Prime Minister

entrepreneurship.quote: The man who does not work for the love of work but only for money is likely to neither make money nor find much fun in life.
entrepreneurship.author: Charles M. Schwab, American steel magnate

entrepreneurship.quote: Be undeniably good. No marketing effort or social media buzzword can be a substitute for that.
entrepreneurship.author: Anthony Volodkin, founder of Hype Machine

entrepreneurship.quote: Ideas are easy. Implementation is hard.
entrepreneurship.author: Guy Kawasaki, founder of AllTop

entrepreneurship.quote: You can say anything to anyone, but how you say it will determine how they will react.
entrepreneurship.author: John Rampton, entrepreneur and investor

entrepreneurship.quote: Always deliver more than expected.
entrepreneurship.author: Larry Page, co-founder of Google

entrepreneurship.quote: Assume you have 90 seconds with a new user before they decide to use your app or delete it.
entrepreneurship.author: Tamara Steffens, Acompli

entrepreneurship.quote: Even if you don't have the perfect idea to begin with, you can likely adapt.
entrepreneurship.author: Victoria Ransom, co-founder of Wildfire Interactive

entrepreneurship.quote: Make your team feel respected, empowered and genuinely excited about the company's mission.
entrepreneurship.author: Tim Westergen, founder of Pandora

entrepreneurship.quote: Stay self-funded as long as possible.
entrepreneurship.author: Garrett Camp, co-founder of Stumbleupon

entrepreneurship.quote: In between goals is a thing called life, that has to be lived and enjoyed.
entrepreneurship.author: Sid Caesar, Entertainer

entrepreneurship.quote: Wonder what your customer really wants? Ask. Don't tell.
entrepreneurship.author: Lisa Stone, co-founder of BlogHer

entrepreneurship.quote: When times are bad is when the real entrepreneurs emerge.
entrepreneurship.author: Robert Kiyosaki, author of Rich Dad Poor Dad

entrepreneurship.quote: What do you need to start a business? Three simple things: know your product better than anyone, know your customer, and have a burning desire to succeed.
entrepreneurship.author: Dave Thomas, founder of Wendy's

entrepreneurship.quote: Get big quietly, so you don't tip off potential competitors.
entrepreneurship.author: Chris Dixon, co-founder of Hunch

entrepreneurship.quote: Don't worry about failure; you only have to be right once.
entrepreneurship.author: Drew Houston, founder of Dropbox

entrepreneurship.quote: Your time is limited, so don't waste it living someone else's life. Don't be trapped by dogma which is living with the results of other people's thinking. Don't let the noise of other's opinions drown out your own inner voice. And most important, have the courage to follow your heart and intuition. They somehow already know what you truly want to become. Everything else is secondary.
entrepreneurship.author: Steve Jobs

entrepreneurship.quote: Don't be cocky. Don't be flashy. There's always someone better than you.
entrepreneurship.author: Tony Hsieh, Zappos.com CEO

entrepreneurship.quote: Don't take too much advice. Most people who have a lot of advice to give — with a few exceptions — generalize whatever they did. Don't over-analyze everything. I myself have been guilty of over-thinking problems. Just build things and find out if they work.
entrepreneurship.author: Ben Silbermann, co-founder of Pinterest

entrepreneurship.quote: Openly share and talk to people about your idea. Use their lack of interest or doubt to fuel your motivation to make it happen.
entrepreneurship.author: Todd Garland, founder of BuySellAds

entrepreneurship.quote: How you climb a mountain is more important than reaching the top.
entrepreneurship.author: Yvon Chouinard, founder of Patagonia

entrepreneurship.quote: Associate yourself with people of good quality, for it is better to be alone than in bad company.
entrepreneurship.author: Booker T. Washington, Educator and author

entrepreneurship.quote: It's fine to celebrate success but it is more important to heed the lessons of failure.
entrepreneurship.author: Bill Gates, co-founder of Microsoft

entrepreneurship.quote: It takes 20 years to build a reputation and five minutes to ruin it. If you think about that, you'll do things differently.
entrepreneurship.author: Warren Buffett, Investor

entrepreneurship.quote: Statistics suggest that when customers complain, business owners and managers ought to get excited about it. The complaining customer represents a huge opportunity for more business.
entrepreneurship.author: Zig Ziglar, author and motivational speaker

entrepreneurship.quote: There is only one success- to be able to spend your life in your own way.
entrepreneurship.author: Christopher Morley, journalist

entrepreneurship.quote: Formal education will make you a living; self-education will make you a fortune.
entrepreneurship.author: Jim Rohn, author and speaker

entrepreneurship.quote: When everything seems to be going against you, remember that the airplane takes off against the wind, not with it.
entrepreneurship.author: Henry Ford, founder of Ford Motor Company

entrepreneurship.quote: Rarely have I seen a situation where doing less than the other guy is a good strategy.
entrepreneurship.author: Jimmy Spithill, Australian yachtsman

entrepreneurship.quote: You miss 100 percent of the shots you don't take.
entrepreneurship.author: Wayne Gretzky, NHL Hall of Famer

entrepreneurship.quote: The best time to plant a tree was 20 years ago. The second best time is now.
entrepreneurship.author: Chinese proverb

entrepreneurship.quote: The secret to successful hiring is this: look for the people who want to change the world.
entrepreneurship.author: Marc Benioff, CEO of Salesforce

entrepreneurship.quote: Twenty years from now, you will be more disappointed by the things that you didn't do than by the ones you did do, so throw off the bowlines, sail away from safe harbor, catch the trade winds in your sails. Explore, Dream, Discover.
entrepreneurship.author: Mark Twain, author

entrepreneurship.quote: If you've got an idea, start today. There's no better time than now to get going. That doesn't mean quit your job and jump into your idea 100% from day one, but there's always small progress that can be made to start the movement.
entrepreneurship.author: Kevin Systrom, co-founder of Instagram

entrepreneurship.quote: It's almost always harder to raise capital than you thought it would be, and it always takes longer. So plan for that.
entrepreneurship.author: Richard Harroch, Venture Capitalist

entrepreneurship.quote: For all of the most important things, the timing always sucks. Waiting for a good time to quit your job? The stars will never align and the traffic lights of life will never all be green at the same time. The universe doesn't conspire against you, but it doesn't go out of its way to line up the pins either. Conditions are never perfect. Someday is a disease that will take your dreams to the grave with you. Pro and con lists are just as bad. If it's important to you and you want to do it eventually, just do it and correct course along the way.
entrepreneurship.author: Timothy Ferriss, author of The 4-Hour Work Week

entrepreneurship.quote: I don't have big ideas. I sometimes have small ideas, which seem to work out.
entrepreneurship.author: Matt Mullenweg, founder of Automattic

entrepreneurship.quote: Fail often so you can succeed sooner.
entrepreneurship.author: Tom Kelley, Ideo partner

entrepreneurship.quote: When you cease to dream you cease to live.
entrepreneurship.author: Malcolm Forbes, chairman and editor in chief of Forbes Magazine

entrepreneurship.quote: Whatever the mind can conceive and believe, the mind can achieve.
entrepreneurship.author: Dr. Napoleon Hill, author of Think and Grow Rich

entrepreneurship.quote: Running a start-up is like eating glass. You just start to like the taste of your own blood.
entrepreneurship.author: Sean Parker, co-founder of Napster

entrepreneurship.quote: My number one piece of advice is: you should learn how to program.
entrepreneurship.author: Mark Zuckerberg, founder of Facebook

entrepreneurship.quote: The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing.
entrepreneurship.author: Walt Disney, co-founder of the Walt Disney Company

entrepreneurship.quote: The pace of change for entrepreneurs is rapidly accelerating, and the cost and risk of launching a new business and getting off the ground is just amazing. The ability to gain user feedback really quickly and adapt to what your consumers want is totally different with the web as it is now. But finding a new market, helping people and taking that original idea and turning it into a business is really exciting right now.
entrepreneurship.author: Matt Mickiewicz, co-founder of 99 Designs

entrepreneurship.quote: Building and hanging on to an audience is the biggest role of social media.
entrepreneurship.author: Matthew Inman, The Oatmeal

entrepreneurship.quote: Every feature has some maintenance cost, and having fewer features lets us focus on the ones we care about and make sure they work very well.
entrepreneurship.author: David Karp, founder of Tumblr

entrepreneurship.quote: A poorly implemented feature hurts more than not having it at all.
entrepreneurship.author: Noah Everett, founder of Twitpic

entrepreneurship.quote: This defines entrepreneur and entrepreneurship the entrepreneur always searches for change, responds to it, and exploits it as an opportunity.
entrepreneurship.author: Peter F. Drucker

entrepreneurship.quote: You don't learn to walk by following rules. You learn by doing and falling over.
entrepreneurship.author: Richard Branson, founder of Virgin Group

entrepreneurship.quote: The fastest way to change yourself is to hang out with people who are already the way you want to be.
entrepreneurship.author: Reid Hoffman, co-founder of Linkedin

entrepreneurship.quote: Risk more than others think is safe. Dream more than others think is practical.
entrepreneurship.author: Howard Schultz, CEO of Starbucks

entrepreneurship.quote: You shouldn't focus on why you can't do something, which is what most people do. You should focus on why perhaps you can, and be one of the exceptions.
entrepreneurship.author: Steve Case, co-founder of AOL

entrepreneurship.quote: The critical ingredient is getting off your butt and doing something. It's as simple as that. A lot of people have ideas, but there are few who decide to do something about them now. Not tomorrow. Not next week. But today. The true entrepreneur is a doer not a dreamer.
entrepreneurship.author: Nolan Bushnell, founder of Atari

entrepreneurship.quote: If you cannot do great things, do small things in a great way.
entrepreneurship.author: Napoleon Hill, author

entrepreneurship.quote: Success is not what you have, but who you are.
entrepreneurship.author: Bo Bennet, author and entreprenuer

entrepreneurship.quote: One of the huge mistakes people make is that they try to force an interest on themselves. You don't choose your passions; your passions choose you.
entrepreneurship.author: Jeff Bezos, founder and CEO of Amazon.com

entrepreneurship.quote: Lots of companies don't succeed over time. What do they fundamentally do wrong? They usually miss the future.
entrepreneurship.author: Larry Page, CEO of Google

entrepreneurship.quote: It takes humility to realize that we don't know everything, not to rest on our laurels and know that we must keep learning and observing. If we don't, we can be sure some startup will be there to take our place.
entrepreneurship.author: Cher Wang, CEO of HTC

entrepreneurship.quote: There's an entrepreneur right now, scared to death, making excuses, saying, ‘It's not the right time just yet.' There's no such thing as a good time. Get out of your garage and go take a chance, and start your business.
entrepreneurship.author: Kevin Plank, CEO of Under Armour

entrepreneurship.quote: Be really picky with your hiring, and hire the absolute best people you possibly can. People are the most important component of almost every business, and attracting the best talent possible is going to make a huge difference.
entrepreneurship.author: Peter Berg, founder of October Three

entrepreneurship.quote: Worry about being better; bigger will take care of itself. Think one customer at a time and take care of each one the best way you can.
entrepreneurship.author: Gary Comer, founder of Land's End

entrepreneurship.quote: You have a viable business only if your product is either better or cheaper than the alternatives. If it's not one or the other, you might make some money at first, but it's not a sustainable business.
entrepreneurship.author: Jim Koch, founder of Boston Beer Co.

entrepreneurship.quote: Every time I took these bigger risks, the opportunity for a bigger payout was always there.
entrepreneurship.author: Casey Neistat, filmmaker

entrepreneurship.quote: If you can do something to get somebody excited — not everybody — but if you can be the best for somebody, then you can win.
entrepreneurship.author: Ron Shaich, founder and CEO of Panera Bread

entrepreneurship.quote: Would you like me to give you a formula for success? It's quite simple, really: Double your rate of failure. You are thinking of failure as the enemy of success. But it isn't at all. You can be discouraged by failure or you can learn from it, so go ahead and make mistakes. Make all you can. Because remember that's where you will find success.
entrepreneurship.author: Thomas J. Watson, businessman

entrepreneurship.quote: People who succeed have momentum. The more they succeed, the more they want to succeed, and the more they find a way to succeed. Similarly, when someone is failing, the tendency is to get on a downward spiral that can even become a self-fulfilling prophecy.
entrepreneurship.author: Tony Robbins, motivational speaker

entrepreneurship.quote: The only limit to our realization of tomorrow will be our doubts of today.
entrepreneurship.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

entrepreneurship.quote: The successful warrior is the average man, with laser-like focus.
entrepreneurship.author: Bruce Lee, actor and martial arts instructor

entrepreneurship.quote: Fall seven times and stand up eight.
entrepreneurship.author: Japanese proverb

entrepreneurship.quote: The successful man is the one who finds out what is the matter with his business before his competitors do.
entrepreneurship.author: Roy L. Smith, animator and film director

entrepreneurship.quote: There's no shortage of remarkable ideas, what's missing is the will to execute them.
entrepreneurship.author: Seth Godin, author and speaker

entrepreneurship.quote: Keep on going, and the chances are that you will stumble on something, perhaps when you are least expecting it. I never heard of anyone ever stumbling on something sitting down.
entrepreneurship.author: Charles F. Kettering, inventor

entrepreneurship.quote: A successful man is one who can lay a firm foundation with the bricks others have thrown at him.
entrepreneurship.author: David Brinkley, newscaster

entrepreneurship.quote: Everyone is a genius. But if you judge a fish by its ability to climb a tree, it will spend its whole life believing it is stupid.
entrepreneurship.author: Albert Einstein, Theoretical Physicist

entrepreneurship.quote: Success in business requires training and discipline and hard work. But if you're not frightened by these things, the opportunities are just as great today as they ever were.
entrepreneurship.author: David Rockefeller, American banker

entrepreneurship.quote: It is never too late to be what you might have been.
entrepreneurship.author: George Eliot, journalist and novelist

entrepreneurship.quote: I am not a product of my circumstances. I am a product of my decisions.
entrepreneurship.author: Stephen Covey, author and businessman

entrepreneurship.quote: There is only one way to avoid criticism: Do nothing, say nothing, and be nothing.
entrepreneurship.author: Aristotle, Greek philosopher

entrepreneurship.quote: Build your own dreams, or someone else will hire you to build theirs.
entrepreneurship.author: Farrah Gray, investor and motivational speaker

entrepreneurship.quote: You may be disappointed if you fail, but you are doomed if you don't try.
entrepreneurship.author: Beverly Sills, operatic soprano
